statements: SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE id > 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC, id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT username, email FROM users
SELECT user_id, email, password FROM users
SELECT * FROM user_credentials
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM user_credentials
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_credentials WHERE mfa_enabled = TRUE AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN user_credentials ON users.user_id = user_credentials.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users INNER JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE 'john%' ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT users.id, users.username, user_roles.role FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT users.id, users.username, two_factor_auth.is_enabled FROM users LEFT JOIN two_factor_auth ON users.id = two_factor_auth.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email, phone FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, date_started, date_expired FROM user_sessions WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_description, log_date FROM user_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, count(log_id) AS total_logs FROM user_logs GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_logs DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.id = r.role_id WHERE u.id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT password, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.username, q.question FROM users u, security_questions q WHERE u.id = 2 AND q.id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, q.question FROM users u JOIN user_questions uq ON u.id = uq.user_id JOIN security_questions q ON uq.question_id = q.id;
SELECT u.username, l.action, l.timestamp FROM users u JOIN user_logs l ON u.id = l.user_id WHERE l.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sessions, u.username FROM user_sessions s JOIN users u ON s.user_id = u.id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_sessions DESC;
